# AI Coding Guidelines for Site de Vendas

## Project Overview
This is a simple static website for selling "bolos de potes" (jar cakes) using basic HTML and CSS. No frameworks, JavaScript, or build tools are used - just plain static files.

## Architecture
- **Single-page application**: All content in `index.html`
- **Styling**: Centralized in `style.css`
- **No dynamic features**: Static content only

## Key Patterns
- **Language**: Use Portuguese for all user-facing text (headings, paragraphs, alt text)
- **HTML Structure**: Keep semantic elements (`<h1>`, `<p>`, etc.) for accessibility
- **CSS**: Simple, direct styling with color schemes like `blueviolet` background
- **File Naming**: Use consistent naming (note: CSS file is `style.css`, not `styles.css` as linked)

## Development Workflow
- **Testing**: Open `index.html` directly in a web browser
- **No build process**: Edit files and refresh browser
- **No dependencies**: Pure HTML/CSS

## Conventions
- **Text Content**: Focus on cake sales, occasions, and welcoming tone
- **Colors**: Vibrant backgrounds (e.g., `blueviolet`) for visual appeal
- **Typography**: Arial font family for readability

## Common Tasks
- Adding new sections: Use semantic HTML elements in `index.html`
- Styling changes: Modify `style.css` with simple selectors
- Content updates: Edit Portuguese text directly in HTML

## File References
- [index.html](index.html): Main page structure and content
- [style.css](style.css): All visual styling
